price: ߌ ߞߊߣߊ߬ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ߬ ߜߘߍ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߝߍ߬ ߘߋ߬ ، ߌ ߡߊ߲߬ߜߏߡߊ߲߫ ߟߊߓߌߟߊ߬ߣߍ߲ ߘߴߌ ߛߌ߰ ߏ߬ ߘߐ߫
arabic: لَّا تَجۡعَلۡ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَقۡعُدَ مَذۡمُومٗا مَّخۡذُولٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: lā tajʿal maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fataqʿuda madhmūman makhdhūlan
